mapper.select:
SELECT /* RentHistory_SQL.getRentHistoryList */ H.RENT_HIST_SEQ AS rentHistSeq ,B.BIKE_NO AS rentBikeNo ,H.RENT_STATION_ID AS rentStationId ,(SELECT STATION_NAME FROM spb.TB_OPR_MLANG_STATION WHERE STATION_ID = H.RENT_STATION_ID AND LANG_CLS_CD = #{lang} ) AS rentStationName ,H.RETURN_STATION_ID AS returnStationId ,(SELECT STATION_NAME FROM spb.TB_OPR_MLANG_STATION WHERE STATION_ID = H.RETURN_STATION_ID AND LANG_CLS_CD = #{lang} ) AS returnStationName ,H.USE_MI AS useMi
,U.USR_SEQ AS usrSeq
, IFNULL( L.MB_ID, IFNULL ( Y.SERIAL_NO , IFNULL( CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(U.USR_MPN_NO),'BRC') as CHAR), '카드결제고객' ))) AS mbId ,H.VOUCHER_SEQ AS voucherSeq , DATE_FORMAT(H.RENT_DTTM ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS rentDttm ,U.USR_CLS_CD AS usrClsCd
, IFNULL( L.MB_ID, IFNULL ( Y.SERIAL_NO , IFNULL( CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(U.USR_MPN_NO),'BRC') as CHAR), '카드결제고객' ))) AS mbId , ( SELECT NOW_STATION_EQUIP_ORD FROM spb.TB_OPR_RACK WHERE RACK_ID = H.RENT_RACK_ID ) AS rentRackId , (SELECT NOW_STATION_EQUIP_ORD FROM spb.TB_OPR_RACK WHERE RACK_ID = H.RETURN_RACK_ID ) AS returnRackId , DATE_FORMAT(H.RENT_DTTM ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS rentDttm , DATE_FORMAT(H.RETURN_DTTM ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS returnDttm , IFNULL((SELECT MLANG_COM_CD_NAME FROM TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = U.USR_CLS_CD AND LANG_CLS_CD = #{lang} ),'GUEST') AS usrClsCdName
, H.RENT_CLS_CD AS rentClsCd , ( SELECT MLANG_COM_CD_NAME FROM TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = H.RENT_CLS_CD AND LANG_CLS_CD = #{lang} ) AS rentClsCdName , H.RETURN_DTTM AS returnDttm , B.BIKE_SE_CD AS bikeSeCd FROM spb.TB_SVC_RENT_HIST H INNER JOIN TB_SVC_USR U ON H.USR_SEQ = U.USR_SEQ
AND USR_MPN_NO = HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{searchWord},'BRC'))
INNER JOIN TB_SVC_MB K ON H.USR_SEQ = K.USR_SEQ AND MB_ID = #{searchWord}
LEFT JOIN TB_SVC_MB L ON ( H.USR_SEQ = L.USR_SEQ ) INNER JOIN TB_OPR_BIKE B ON B.BIKE_ID = H.RENT_BIKE_ID
AND B.BIKE_SE_CD = #{bikeSeCd}
INNER JOIN TB_SVC_SERIAL_NO_HIST Z ON ( Z.USR_SEQ = H.USR_SEQ AND U.USR_CLS_CD IN ( 'USR_002', 'USR_003') AND Z.VOUCHER_SEQ = H.VOUCHER_SEQ AND SERIAL_NO = #{searchWord} )
LEFT JOIN TB_SVC_SERIAL_NO_HIST Y ON ( H.USR_SEQ AND Y.VOUCHER_SEQ = H.VOUCHER_SEQ AND U.USR_CLS_CD IN ( 'USR_002', 'USR_003') )
INNER JOIN spb.TB_OPR_STATION X ON ( STATION_GRP_SEQ = #{returnStationGrpSeq} AND H.RETURN_STATION_ID = X.STATION_ID )
AND H.RETURN_STATION_ID = #{returnStationId}
AND H.RENT_DTTM BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{searchStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND ( STR_TO_DATE(#{searchEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')+ INTERVAL 1 DAY - INTERVAL 1 SECOND) AND H.RENT_YMD BETWEEN #{searchStartDate} AND #{searchEndDate}
AND 1=2
ORDER BY H.RENT_HIST_SEQ DESC
LIMIT #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT H.RENT_HIST_SEQ AS rentHistSeq
,H.RETURN_ADMIN_ID AS adminId
,(SELECT MLANG_COM_CD_NAME FROM spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = H.RENT_CLS_CD AND LANG_CLS_CD = #{lang} ) AS rentClsCdName ,(SELECT BIKE_NO FROM spb.TB_OPR_BIKE WHERE BIKE_ID = H.RENT_BIKE_ID ) AS rentBikeNo
,(SELECT MLANG_COM_CD_NAME FROM spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = (SELECT BIKE_STUS_CD FROM spb.TB_OPR_BIKE WHERE BIKE_ID = H.RENT_BIKE_ID) AND LANG_CLS_CD = #{lang} ) AS rentStatusName ,(SELECT BIKE_STUS_CD FROM spb.TB_OPR_BIKE WHERE BIKE_ID = H.RENT_BIKE_ID) AS rentStatusCd ,H.RENT_BIKE_ID AS rentBikeId ,(SELECT TERMINAL_ID FROM TB_OPR_BIKE WHERE BIKE_ID = H.RENT_BIKE_ID ) AS terminalId ,(SELECT STATION_NAME FROM spb.TB_OPR_MLANG_STATION WHERE STATION_ID = H.RENT_STATION_ID AND LANG_CLS_CD =#{lang} ) AS rentStationName ,(SELECT NOW_STATION_EQUIP_ORD FROM spb.TB_OPR_RACK WHERE RACK_ID = H.RENT_RACK_ID ) AS rentRackId ,(SELECT NOW_STATION_EQUIP_ORD FROM spb.TB_OPR_RACK WHERE RACK_ID = H.RETURN_RACK_ID ) AS returnRackId ,(SELECT STATION_NAME FROM spb.TB_OPR_MLANG_STATION WHERE STATION_ID = H.RETURN_STATION_ID AND LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001' ) AS returnStationName ,DATE_FORMAT(H.RENT_DTTM ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS rentDttm ,DATE_FORMAT(H.RETURN_DTTM ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS returnDttm ,H.USE_MI AS useMi ,(SELECT IFNULL(MB_ID ,'GUEST') FROM spb.TB_SVC_MB WHERE USR_SEQ = H.USR_SEQ) AS mbId ,H.USR_SEQ AS userSeq
,CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(U.USR_MPN_NO),'BRC') as CHAR) AS usrMpnNo ,H.RENT_CLS_CD AS rentClsCd ,(SELECT MLANG_COM_CD_NAME FROM spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = H.RENT_CLS_CD AND LANG_CLS_CD = #{lang} ) AS rentClsCdName ,(CASE WHEN H.OVER_FEE_YN = 'Y' THEN (SELECT FORMAT(OVER_FEE ,0,2) FROM spb.TB_SVC_RENT_OVER_FEE WHERE RENT_HIST_SEQ = H.RENT_HIST_SEQ) ELSE 0 END) AS overFee ,DATE_FORMAT(V.VOUCHER_STR_DTTM ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS voucherStrDttm ,DATE_FORMAT(V.VOUCHER_END_DTTM ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS voucherEndDttm ,U.RENT_ENC_PWD AS rentEncPwd ,(SELECT BIKE_SE_CD FROM spb.TB_OPR_BIKE WHERE BIKE_ID = H.RENT_BIKE_ID) AS bikeSeCd FROM spb.TB_SVC_RENT_HIST H INNER JOIN spb.TB_SVC_USR U ON H.USR_SEQ = U.USR_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVC_VOUCHER V ON H.VOUCHER_SEQ = V.VOUCHER_SEQ WHERE H.RENT_HIST_SEQ = #{rentHistSeq}
